name: PCSX2 Memory Card
summary: A PS2 file is a virtual memory card used by PCSX2 and the now-discontinued AetherSX2, which are PlayStation 2 (PS2) emulators. It contains saved game data that preserves a user's progress in a game, functioning identically to an actual PS2 memory card when loading it with PCSX2 or AetherSX2.
